comments.author: alexandre.f.demers@gmail.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/535.10 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/17.0.947.0 Safari/535.10

Steps to reproduce:

Executed litmus testcase:
https://litmus.mozilla.org/show_test.cgi?id=2618


Actual results:

The "%" field is enabled even when task is set as Completed.


Expected results:

According to the test, the field should be disabled when the task's status is put as Completed. However, it is still editable after selecting Completed. However, it's only a minor bug since changing the value in the task dialog will not be saved (field is editable, but not applicable).

Expected results:

According to the test, the field should be disabled when the task's status is put as Completed. However, it is still editable after selecting Completed. However, it's only a minor bug since changing the value in the task dialog will not be saved (field is editable, but not applicable).
